name: Plug-in Electric (PEV) Rebates - TID
description: Turlock Irrigation District (TID) offers residential customers a $500 rebate for the purchase or lease of a qualifying new or used PEV. Customers may also be eligible for a $300 rebate for the installation of a qualifying Level 2 EVSE. Low-income customers enrolled in the TID CARES Program are eligible for additional rebates of $700 per vehicle and $100 per charger. For more information, including eligibility requirements, see the TID Residential Electric Vehicle Rebates and CARES Program website.
